name: Rune Forge - LD#37
description:
Created for Ludum Dare #37 - Theme: One Room

More of a proof of concept, really. You can manipulate Materium, a substance that can be used both as magic fuel, and can be converted into any other known substance, such as iron. Create stuff at the forge and sell it, and try not to fail.

Full source provided as required by Ludum Dare rules. Fungus can be found at http://fungusgames.com/ and is a free and open-source project. All standard Unity Assets (of which I only used code) belong to Unity3D. All models/textures/game logic created by myself during the 48 hours of the competition, as required.
